response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be $12,000 to me. Considering its significant impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
